channel.title: iHaxx Server - Version 2.0.0 - Development Thread
channel.description:
[b]Hello MoparScape[/b],
Been a long long time since i've posted around here. I left mopar back in 2008 due to my daughter being born and then a year later another popped along. Now they don't need 24/7 attention i'm looking to restart my server from a scratch base. Due to me not having sufficient time everyday to develop i'm gunna need a team (kids still need me).
[b]Contact Me;[/b] MSN: Root@iHaxx.Net
[b] About Me;[/b] My name is Danny i'm 20 years old from london. I have played runescape from 2003 to 2007 and then moved on to private servers towards the end of 2006 most of my websites i have made have been successful and have made some desent money. I'm a qualified web designer along with knowing quite a bit of Java + C++. If you would like to see some of my work then you can inbox me on here.
[b] Base;[/b] I'm thinking of using Hyperion or Project Insanity.
If you're intrested in becoming a developer for iHaxx then you will need to post on this thread with some details [i](application form is below).[/i] If you can't actual code Java or PHP then please do not post in this thread with an application as i won't even take a second look.
[b]Features[/b] [code]Coming Soon...[/code]
[b]Media;[/b] [code] Coming Soon...[/code]
[b]Applications;[/b] [code] Please apply for a spot here; [/code] *
Thank you for reading and i hope some users take intrest.
Regards, Elux

item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Hello MoparScape,

Been a long long time since i’ve posted around here. I left mopar back in 2008 due to my daughter being born and then a year later another popped along. Now they don’t need 24/7 attention i’m looking to restart my server from a scratch base. Due to me not having sufficient time everyday to develop i’m gunna need a team (kids still need me).

Contact Me;
MSN: Root@iHaxx.Net


About Me;
My name is Danny i’m 20 years old from london. I have played runescape from 2003 to 2007 and then moved on to private servers towards the end of 2006 most of my websites i have made have been successful and have made some desent money. I’m a qualified web designer along with knowing quite a bit of Java + C++. If you would like to see some of my work then you can inbox me on here.


Base;
I’m thinking of using Hyperion or Project Insanity.

If you’re intrested in becoming a developer for iHaxx then you will need to post on this thread with some details (application form is below). If you can’t actual code Java or PHP then please do not post in this thread with an application as i won’t even take a second look.

Features

Media;

Coming Soon...

Applications;

Please apply for a spot here;

Thank you for reading and i hope some users take intrest.

Regards,
Elux
